# TASK::TASK_SMART_FLEE_PED

## Summary
Tells a ped to flee the given ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **PED_INDEX** otherPedIndex
* **FLOAT** safeDistance
* **INT** fleeTime: Is an INT (-1 indicates flee forever)
* **BOOL** preferPavements = false
* **BOOL** updateTargetToNearestHatedPed = false

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Makes a ped run away from another ped (fleeTarget).

distance = ped will flee this distance.
fleeTime = ped will flee for this amount of time, set to "-1" to flee forever
